property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated. [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. −2: You may reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game or choose a face-up artifact card you own in exile. Put that card into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Colorless spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. [+1]: Exile the top card of your library face down and look at it. Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into your hand. −3: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ugin's Conjurant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Ugin's Conjurant while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from Ugin's Conjurant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district - now let's go save the world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?" - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's something peculiar about the cats today." - Janoc, Tin Street tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. Then the angels brought the dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Gideon Blackblade is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Gideon Blackblade during your turn. [+1]: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn. −6: Exile target nonland permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance. When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can't save yourself, you fight to give someone else a chance." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?" - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with mana value 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, vigilance Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Prison Realm leaves the battlefield. When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse could persuade them to put aside their feud.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) −2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Teyo gifted his shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control. −2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come." - Ashiok

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no future save the one my master wills."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills four cards. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They make it clear we are nothing to them." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Draw two cards, then amass Zombies X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Niv-Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All I ask is complete obedience." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead. When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game. Exile Finale of Revelation.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin saw the gem that connected Bolas to his Meditation Realm as the key to his brother's downfall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You may reveal the first card you draw each turn as you draw it. Whenever you reveal an instant or sorcery card this way, copy that card and you may cast the copy. That copy costs {2} less to cast. When God-Eternal Kefnet dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. [+1]: Target player mills two cards. Draw a card. −8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells your opponents cast that target a creature or planeswalker you control cost {2} more to cast. −2: Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token. Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies." - Kasmina

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them." - Kiora

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates." - Samut

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. −2: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, then return it to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon." - Narset

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amass Zombies 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Silent Submersible deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What they don't know will definitely hurt them." - Lazav

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The safest place for you is not now."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never liked you. Now get up - we have a fight to finish."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them." - Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost. {T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious - depends on which of us you ask."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in graveyards. Command the Dreadhorde deals damage to you equal to the total mana value of those cards. Put them onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana seized the reins of Bolas's vast army, gritting her teeth behind the Chain Veil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them. −1: Target player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand. Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?" The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy any number of target planeswalkers. Choose a planeswalker you control. Put two loyalty counters on it for each planeswalker destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path to power is often paved with atrocities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are called Eternals. They will never stop." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards. When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature or planeswalker you control When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?" - Mileva, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card. [+1]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. −4: Each player sacrifices two creatures. −9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player. −2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove up to five counters from target artifact, creature, planeswalker, or opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!" - Shauntal, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see you're out of the wall." - Nahiri

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}. Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls - it's just they're so rude about it." - Kaya

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them." - Teysa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors." - Rakdos

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vizier of the Scorpion enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike. {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed." - Angrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good." - Jaya Ballard

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater. Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't." - Ral Zarek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Bond of Passion deals 2 damage to any other target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why don't we fight for what's right and let bureaucrats argue over details?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind." - Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker. [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you." - Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her triumph came not from achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dreadhorde Twins enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast up to one target instant card and/or up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard each with mana value X or less without paying their mana costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. If X is 10 or more, copy each of those spells twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Goblin Assault Team dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Grim Initiate dies, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker. Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. Amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Ilharg, the Raze-Boar attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fall back! You are no match for this." - Samut

property.name: Rules
property.value: If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead. −2: Jaya, Venerated Firemage deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives - that's grabbin' time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Mizzium Tank becomes an artifact creature and gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?" - Dhuuz, kronch wrangler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, each Dragon you control deals 1 damage to that creature. [+1]: Until end of turn, each planeswalker you control becomes a 4/4 red Dragon creature and gains flying. −3: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents can't gain life. −2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target. {1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Find out whose that is. I like its energy." - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. −2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you don't speak Wolf, allow me to translate: ‘One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'" - Arlinn Kord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put nine +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 Elemental creature with haste named Vitu-Ghazi. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eternal armies advanced on Vitu-Ghazi. At Nissa's command, Vitu-Ghazi advanced on them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Nurturer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with mana value X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. If X is 10 or more, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton." - Jiang Yanggu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When God-Eternal Rhonas enters the battlefield, double the power of each other creature you control until end of turn. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. When God-Eternal Rhonas dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." −1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He listens to the sounds of battle filtering down from above, waiting for silence, waiting for his time to claim the streets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows - sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}. [+1]: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature land you control. Untap it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land. −8: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, instead search your library for up to three land cards. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose four. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Create a 2/2 Citizen creature token that's all colors. • Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. • Proliferate. • You gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pollenbright Druid enters the battlefield, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elite training, single-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever Snarespinner blocks a creature with flying, Snarespinner gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we die, we die. But we cannot let him win." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought this was a civilized plane. How are there so many feral beasts?" - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast creature spells as though they had flash. [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach. −2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may cast it if it's a creature spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trials. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. [+1]: You gain 3 life. −2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player sacrifices an artifact. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Target player sacrifices a planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grand city? No. This is nothing but another squalid cage."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Bioessence Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each loyalty counter on planeswalkers you control. Whenever one or more loyalty counters are put on planeswalkers you control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Bioessence Hydra.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target creature. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land. • Destroy target planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to." - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+0. [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered. −2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Dreadhorde Butcher deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Dreadhorde Butcher. When Dreadhorde Butcher dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Elite Guardmage enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful. You'll have more than Dovin to contend with if you hope to breach New Prahv." - Lavinia, to Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player mills four cards. Amass Zombies 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.) Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards plus one. You gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kytheon had known war every day of his life. Now he finally knew peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Huatli's Raptor enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amass Zombies X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, lifelink {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world - and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Discard a land card: Living Twister deals 2 damage to any target. {G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!" - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Merfolk Skydiver enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {3}{G}{U}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield. [+1]: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control. −3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. −8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. [+2]: Scry 1. −2: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time to find the melting point of lazotep." - Ral Zarek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control. When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Rubblebelt Rioters attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the system is broken, break the system." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink. [+2]: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. −X: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of war, only death flourishes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents. [+1]: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. −3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery. [+1]: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. −3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token. Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amass Zombies 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass Zombies 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have menace. −2: Amass Zombies 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause their controller to search their library. −1: Target player mills four cards. Then exile each opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact, instant, and sorcery spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast. −1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. −3: You gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. −3: Exile target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. −1: Untap target permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. −X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. −2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. −1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. −2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firemind Vessel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add two mana of different colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The city mourned Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for his rebirth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast. At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Guild Globe enters the battlefield, draw a card. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Guild Globe: Add two mana of different colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why would someone have built . . . wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!" - Commander Grozdan

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mana Geode enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it." - Saheeli Rai

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. It came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it. {T}: Add {C}. {X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped. When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}: Mobilized District becomes a 3/3 Citizen creature with vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature and planeswalker you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack with two or more non-Gideon creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures. [+2]: Until end of turn, Gideon, the Oathsworn becomes a 5/5 white Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. (He can't attack if he was cast this turn.) −9: Exile Gideon, the Oathsworn and each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance - their last hope - flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company. {3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie." - Kaya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. [+1]: Draw a card. −7: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection. {3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Arcane Strategist, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) [+2]: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life. −3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. −8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.
